entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:29 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 08:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: NE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with freezing rain. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 06:28 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 06:28 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 06:28 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023
